TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EdmRelationshipNavigationPropertyAttribute extends System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmPropertyAttribute

summary.span: 屬性 (Attribute)，表示此屬性 (Property) 代表導覽屬性。

span.span: Attribute that indicates that the property represents a navigation property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會將類別 (Class) 的導覽屬性連結至定義在概念模型中之實體 (Entity) 類型的導覽屬性。The links the navigation property of a class to the navigation property of an entity type that is defined in the conceptual model. 此屬性會套用到導覽屬性的下列型別：This attribute is applied to the following types of navigation properties: - 屬性會傳回相關物件。Properties that return an of related objects. - 屬性會傳回的值相關的物件，如下列範例從`SalesOrderDetail`型別。Properties that return the value of the of a related object, as in the following example from the `SalesOrderDetail` type.

MemberSignature.Value: public EdmRelationshipNavigationPropertyAttribute (string relationshipNamespaceName, string relationshipName, string targetRoleName);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string relationshipNamespaceName, string relationshipName, string targetRoleName) cil managed
Public Sub New (relationshipNamespaceName As String, relationshipName As String, targetRoleName As String)
public: EdmRelationshipNavigationPropertyAttribute(System::String ^ relationshipNamespaceName, System::String ^ relationshipName, System::String ^ targetRoleName);

param.name: relationshipNamespaceName
param.span: 關聯性 (Relationship) 屬性的命名空間 (Namespace) 名稱。

span.span: The namespace name of the relationship property.

param.name: relationshipName
param.span: 此關聯性名稱不符合命名空間。

span.span: The relationship name is not namespace qualified.

param.name: targetRoleName
param.span: 位於關聯性另一端的角色名稱。

span.span: The role name at the other end of the relationship.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此關聯性名稱不應該包含命名空間。The relationship name should not contain a namespace. 如果您加入命名空間關聯性的名稱，例如 '*MyNamespace*。*MyRelationship*'，會發生錯誤。If you add the namespace to the relationship name, for example '*MyNamespace*.*MyRelationship*', an error will occur.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RelationshipName As String
public: property System::String ^ RelationshipName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得不符合的關聯性名稱。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此關聯性名稱不符合命名空間。The relationship name is not namespace qualified. 關聯性的名稱由指定`Name`屬性`Association`概念模型中定義此關聯性的項目。The name of the relationship is specified by the `Name` attribute of the `Association` element that defines this relationship in the conceptual model. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Association 項目 (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41)。For more information, see [Association Element (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RelationshipNamespaceName As String
public: property System::String ^ RelationshipNamespaceName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 導覽屬性的命名空間名稱。

span.span: The namespace name of the navigation property.
A that is the namespace name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所指定關聯性的命名空間`Namespace`屬性`Schema`項目，其中包含概念模型中定義此關聯性的關聯。The namespace of the relationship is specified by the `Namespace` attribute of the `Schema` element that contains the association that defines this relationship in the conceptual model. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Association 項目 (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41)。For more information, see [Association Element (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TargetRoleName As String
public: property System::String ^ TargetRoleName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得位於關聯性另一端的角色名稱。

span.span: Gets the role name at the other end of the relationship.

value.span: 目標角色名稱是由概念模型中定義此關聯性之關聯中的另一個 項目的 屬性所定義。

span.span: The target role name is specified by the attribute of the other element in the association that defines this relationship in the conceptual model.

value.span: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Association 項目 (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41)。
